title: Social Media Manager and AI Video Content Creator
job_overview:
Now Hiring: Full-Time Social Media Manager & AI Video Content Creator (Personal Brand)

Location: Remote – Nightshift (USA-based client)
Type: Full-Time
Start Date: To be discussed

IMPORTANT — Only Apply If You are familiar with AI Creation Tools
Before you click Apply, please make sure you actively use AI-powered tools to create content. We are specifically looking for someone who is skilled in AI video generation, AI talking avatars, and AI-enhanced content production — not just basic graphic design.

 Examples of acceptable AI tools:

Synthesia (AI talking head videos)
HeyGen (AI avatar videos)
D-ID (virtual presenters)
Colossyan (AI training videos)
ElevenLabs, Murf AI, or similar (realistic AI voiceovers)
Canva AI, ChatGPT, or other AI tools for scripts, captions, or creative planning.

If you don’t have experience using tools like these to create AI-generated videos and content, please do not apply — this role is for someone ready to produce innovative, AI-driven social media content that stands out.

We’re looking for a dedicated, creative, and strategic Social Media Manager and AI Video Content Creator to champion the personal brand of a dynamic individual whose mission centers on storytelling, community, and purposeful living. This is more than just managing posts — it’s about bringing a unique personality to life online and expanding a genuine connection with an engaged audience.

You’ll be creating and managing meaningful, on-brand content that highlights themes like family, faith, wellness, creativity, leadership, and everyday inspiration. If you’re passionate about translating voice and values into a vibrant digital presence — and you have the skills to produce cutting-edge AI-generated content — we’d love to meet you.

What We’re Looking For
2+ years managing social media for a personal brand, entrepreneur, coach, or public figure

Proven experience creating AI-generated videos (talking avatars or virtual presenters) is a must — we want innovative, attention-grabbing content!

Must be a professional and experienced user of AI video generation platforms such as Synthesia, HeyGen, DeepBrain, Sora, or comparable tools capable of creating realistic, talking avatars that closely mimic human appearance and speech.

Strong writing skills with an eye for brand voice, tone, and storytelling

Skilled with Canva, Meta Business Suite, scheduling, analytics tools

Confident with short-form video creation for Reels, TikTok, and Stories

Organized, self-motivated, able to manage multiple platforms

Passion for purpose-driven work in wellness, leadership, or faith-based spaces

Responsibilities
Develop and execute a strategic monthly content calendar

Write on-brand captions for posts, stories, carousels, reels

Repurpose long-form content into short-form engaging pieces

Create branded visuals and templates

Create and publish AI-generated talking videos

Manage daily posting on Pinterest, Amazon, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Threads

Engage with followers, respond to DMs/comments, foster community

Monitor analytics and provide reports with insights and recommendations

How to Apply 
Email the following to Upgrade to see actual info
with the subject line: Social Media Manager Application – [Your Name]

Your Resume 
2–3 samples of social media accounts you’ve managed or a Portfolio showcasing your best content work
A Cover Letter telling us why you’d be a great fit

And MOST IMPORTANTLY:
An OUT-OF-THE-BOX AI-GENERATED VIDEO showing why you’re the perfect Social Media Manager & AI Video Content Creator for this role. Be creative — use a talking avatar, virtual presenter, or other innovative AI format to highlight your skills and style.

We can’t wait to see how you bring personality, purpose, and AI-powered creativity together!
